title: СУШИ МАЙСТОР
Java Developer
Quality Assurance

category:
Категория:


ИТ - Разработка/поддръжка на софтуер,
ИТ - Разработка/поддръжка на хардуер,
Контакт центрове (Call Centers)
description_requirements:
Who we are:

 We are excited to announce that Convergys has completed its acquisition of Stream, creating a world-class customer management firm made up of 125,000 employees working in more 
 than 150 service centers, offering services in 47 languages in 31 countries. Both companies are known for providing exceptional service. Now, combining the best assets of each, 
 we offer greater expertise and services for our clients and many more career opportunities for our talented employees.

 Clients and customers around the globe can now benefit from our expanded geographic footprint, language capabilities, and breadth and depth of services.

 What we offer:

 Great multicultural environment, strong team spirit with multiple initiatives involved - team buildings, Friday fruits, Happy hour at the Coffee corner and much more...

 What we are searching:

 We are searching for IT enthusiast with basic IT skills to became technical engineer for Cloud based software and technologies

 Key responsibilities of the role:

 The Support Engineer Office 365 will ensure that all customers are satisfied with the effectiveness and efficiency of the support they receive. By utilizing knowledge of the customer environment, the Support Engineer will deliver timely and high quality incident resolution focusing on prevention and knowledge transfer.

 Personal Success profile

 * Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills in German language
 * Customer-oriented, possessing good soft skills 
 * Ability to describe technical information both with technical terms and in simple words
 * Ability to capture information easily, summarize it and provide it briefly
 * Ability to work under constant workload
 * Ability to quickly search in the web for any information needed
 * Technically-oriented person, good at troubleshooting and problem solving

 Key professional and personal skills:

 * Basic networking knowledge (have you ever set up a router at home? do you know what IP address is?)
 * Interest in IT (our product changes almost on a daily basis - will you keep up?)
 * Familiarity with Microsoft products (Basic knowledge of Office 365 and its services - Exchange Online, SharePoint Online, Lync Online etc.) 
 * Technical background is considered as an advantage

 Our offer:

 * Strong remuneration package 
 * Achievement recognition bonus policy
 * Individual career path - personal training on the maintained technologies; management and technical career growth, enhanced by learning and development program; regular performance assessment; 
 personal certification plan and great source of technical articles and support information
 * Standard working hours 
 * Environment of high skilled and collaborative colleagues

 If you recognize your profile in the above mentioned requirements, we would be happy to contact you further.

ИТ - Административни дейности и продажби,
Контакт центрове (Call Centers),
Телекомуникации - административни дейности и продажби
description_requirements:
60K is the largest independent outsourcer not only in Bulgaria but on the Balkans as well. Our company is a true story of how dreams come true and proves that as long as people work together as a team and put their best efforts nothing is unachievable.
Through the years of success and growth we have achieved more than we have ever expected thus accomplishing fully our mission statement “60K promises to provide service that exceeds the expectations of our Clients, their Customers and our Staff”. Led by the fact that Happiness and Success is easy to achieve when you work with great Professionals and true Friends, we built 60K as the Place Where All the Happy People Work providing our employees with a large scale of options for both personal and professional development.
Striving to become a world leader in putting people first in their Customer Experience, we developed internally a strong management team that currently is in charge of the operations for five global clients’ projects who are known as worldwide leaders in their area of operations. As a professional outsourcer and a reliable business solutions provider, we are boosting the performance of some of our smaller boutique clients as well, which makes the total number of ten amazing successful projects within 60K presented everyday by 900 amazing people from our Sofia and Plovdiv based offices.
Due to our company and operational expansion, we are looking for talented professionals and young enthusiasts who are eager to become the face of our international business and present our clients’ global brands worldwide by being part of a global international team. Become part of our Award winning team on the position of a
                   TECHNICAL SUPPORT AGENT WITH ENGLISHYour Role:You will be required to represent 60K and our Client on a top level providing high quality customer support services via telephone and e-mail. You will be involved into our dynamic and professionally structured business process and will be responsible to keep up with the level of customers’ satisfaction expectations. Your day-to-day tasks will be focused on providing excellent customer support services meeting our clients’ service level agreements.Your responsibilities:• To provide excellent technical support and customer care services to the end users of our Client; • To be able to react on customers’ requests promptly and in a professional manner;• To operate correctly with our Client’s internal software programs and applications; • To be able to meet 60K requirements concerning high quality services provision.Our requirements:• Fluency in English – both written and spoken; • High technical knowledge and interests in networking;• Excellent communication and interpersonal skills; • Excellent computer literacy;• Strong orientation to achieving team’s goals and targets set;• Willingness to learn and develop;• Team player open to share knowledge and to support your colleagues;• Professional attitude and orientation to details.Just as a strong advantage:• Knowledge in any other language besides the mentioned above;• Previous experience in servicing clients – not necessarily in the Call Center industry.              You are welcome to join our team of professionals!In return you will get:• Excellent multinational business environment and a friendly atmosphere; • Great team of qualified professionals willing to help, guide, and coach you;• Open-minded management team promoting innovation, personal development, and professional growth;• Constant and extensive training programs;• Competitive remuneration and a bonus scheme for results; • Social benefits and free company transportation.Challenged by this career opportunity?We will expect your CV in English and please do not forget to specify the reference number of the position you are applying for. All applications will be treated in strict confidentiality.Disclaimer: Only short-listed candidates will be contacted.

As a professional outsourcer and a reliable business solutions provider, we are boosting the performance of some of our smaller boutique clients as well, which makes the total number of ten amazing successful projects within 60K presented everyday by 900 amazing people from our Sofia and Plovdiv based offices.
Due to our company and operational expansion, we are looking for talented professionals and young enthusiasts who are eager to become the face of our international business and present our clients’ global brands worldwide by being part of a global international team. Become part of our Award winning team on the position of a
           BRITISH ENGLISH SPEAKING CUSTOMER SUPPORT REPRESENTATIVE   Your Role:  You will be required to represent 60K and our Client on a top level providing high quality customer support services via telephone and/ or e-mail. You will be involved into our dynamic and professionally structured business process and will be responsible to keep up with the level of customers’ satisfaction expectations. Your day-to-day tasks will be focused on providing excellent customer support services meeting our clients’ service level agreements.   Your responsibilities:  • To provide excellent support and customer care services to the end users of our Client;  • To be able to react on customers’ requests promptly and in a professional manner; • To operate correctly with our Client’s internal software programs and applications;  • To be able to meet 60K requirements concerning high quality services provision.   Our requirements:  • Fluency in English – both written and spoken;  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills;  • Excellent computer literacy; • Strong orientation to achieving team’s goals and targets set; • Willingness to learn and develop; • Team player open to share knowledge and to support your colleagues; • Professional attitude and orientation to details.   Just as a strong advantage:  • British accent in your pronunciation, as well as practical knowledge in typical phrases and language constructions in British English; • Knowledge in any other language besides the mentioned above; • Previous experience in servicing clients – not necessarily in the Call Center industry.                 You are welcome to join our team of professionals!   In return you will get:  • Excellent multinational business environment and a friendly atmosphere;  • Great team of qualified professionals willing to help, guide, and coach you; • Open-minded management team promoting innovation, personal development, and professional growth; • Flexible working time; • Constant and extensive training programs; • Competitive remuneration and a bonus scheme for results;  • Social benefits and free company transportation.   Challenged by this career opportunity?  We will expect your CV in English and please do not forget to specify the reference number of the position you are applying for. All applications will be treated in strict confidentiality.  Disclaimer: Only short-listed candidates will be contacted.

title: FRENCH AND ENGLISH SPEAKING CUSTOMER SUPPORT REPRESENTATIVE
advertiser: Sixty K Plc - International Contacts Centres

description_requirements:
Catenate is an international company with offices in München(DE), Baar (CH), Rome(IT), Sofia(BG) and Amsterdam(NL).  Catenate is a Business Integration company. We provide our clients with Business Integration consulting, technologies and solutions.  Our team has many years of project management expertise, as well as extensive IT and process & strategy expertise. Our industry-wide benchmarking experience gives our clients an insight into the best Business Integration practices in the Telecommunications, Automotive, Engineering, Railway, Oil & Gas, Chemical, Transportation, Electronics & High-Technology and Financial Industries.  Currently we are looking for a highly motivated Project Manager to extend our team.  Main responsibilities:

Project management and delivering a number of key profile projects
Project plan creation
Leading of technical team
Regular reporting

 Requirements:

Bachelor or Master degree in IT field, Business administraion or similar
At least 3 years of experience delivering IT or technical solutions (ideally in a service based environment)
2+ Years Project Management Experience
Experience of full project life cycle delivery
Fluent German and English
A self-starter with excellent communication skills both to developers and Senior Management
Ability to travel to EU countries

 Advantages:

Good people management skills
Certification in Project management field
Experience in internatioal work environment

 We offer:

Attractive salary + additional bonus (subject to satisfactory performance and utilisation)
Opportunity to use cutting edge technologies in real projects
Environment of high skilled and collaborative colleagues
Dynamic and interesting projects for world class clients

 If you recognize your profile in the above mentioned requirements, we would be happy to contact you further. Please apply directly or send us your CV in English.  Only the approved candidates would be contacted.

title: ENGLISH SPEAKING CUSTOMER SUPPORT REPRESENTATIVE
advertiser: Sixty K Plc - International Contacts Centres

category:
Категория:


ИТ - Разработка/поддръжка на софтуер,
Научна и изследователска дейност,
Инженери
description_requirements:
BTL is an international leading manufacturer of electronic medical equipment. We are specialized in the fields of cardiology, physiotherapy and aesthetic medicine.  Owning more than 50 trade companies and partnering with over 200 independent international distributors, BTL operates in more than 100 countries worldwide. For over 10 years the company has been developing very successfully on the Bulgarian market, where the main production plant is based. 
This is a unique opportunity to join your skills, experience and ideas with a team of highly motivated individuals who want to build products in the challenging field of medical systems.  Join us in Sofia on our journey from ideas to products!
 
Position: Senior Embedded Software Engineer
Job description:

Analyse product software needs and build proposals for satisfying them
Take part in product design as part of a diverse team of specialists (hardware, mechanics, manufacturing, marketing)
Prototype, design and develop various solutions in search of the one that will make a great product
Support and coach younger engineers
Participate in Technology / Supplier / Tool Selection etc. for new developments

We need:

Degree in Software, Electronic Engineering or equivalent
8+ years of embedded C/C++ experience in R&D, on commercialized products
Full embedded software lifecycle experience (requirements analysis, software design, implementation, integration, testing, production support and certification)
Capability and desire to work with high autonomy
Strong team player capable of leading, helping and teaching others
Passion for technology and for building electronic products
Innovative thinking and creativity
Good written and verbal English

We offer:

Possibilities for career and personal development
Competitive remuneration package
Opportunity to work on a diverse set of products as part of a team of highly motivated professionals
Friendly environment that brings out the best of your individual strengths and skills
International exposure

If you are interested in further exploring this career opportunity, please apply with your CV.
Only short listed candidates will be contacted.
title: Senior Embedded Developer
